resources.string: Create a backup from your data when upgrading to a newer version
Status is now copied to clipboard
"Something wrong? Click me to Report. Note--Initiates a crash. Its normal. Just type your comments in the dialog box and mail it along with the version you're using."
Share B58 WhatsApp with your friends

"Hey, do you like WhatsApp but do you want more privacy and additional features like \u0009\u00091.Themes to change colors as per your wish \u0009\u00092.Privacy \u0009\u00093.Text selection \u0009\u00094.Hide Archived chats \u0009\u00095.Your name and phone number in action bar and much more??? \u0009\u0009Check this http://destyy.com/w0unh8 . \u0009\u0009NOTE:I can add more features upon request. Thanks in advance."
If you previously used B58 WhatsApp or any other app that supports full backup feature and you made a backup,rename that folder to B58Backup and then you can restore it by pressing the button below.
"Stop updating your last seen and being online (if activated you can't see others last seen)"
"Don't tell the sender that you have received the message (I don't recommend it, you receive new messages probably later)"
"Don't tell the group that you have received the message (I don't recommend it, you receive new messages probably later)"
"Don't tell the broadcast sender that you have the message (I don't recommend it, you receive new messages probably later)"
"Don't tell the sender that you played the audio message"
"Don't tell the group that you have played the audio message"
"Don't tell the broadcast sender that you have played the audio message"
"Don't tell the sender that you have read the message"
"Don't tell the group that you have read the messages"
"Don't tell the broadcast sender that you have read the message"
"Don't tell the sender that you are recording a voice message"
"Don't tell the sender that you are typing a message"
Check if you are using the latest version
Coded and designed by Bharath R(B58)
Click to donate to me through Paypal.
Scan this QR code to donate through Paytm(Indian Users).
Set Your Name To Home ActionBar
Choose to show number or status.
Show your number/status in Home ActionBar Under Name.
"Show toast when contact is online, 1. You must be online 2. You must have a chat created with contact"
Restore data from backup created using B58Backup
Support me with a small token of appreciation.
Disable Contact last seen in main screen(Requires Restart).
Check to hide Archived chat(Requires Restart)
Check to Hide date and time while copying two or more messages(Requires Restart).
Check to enable Text Selection(Requires Restart)
Hide voice call and video call button in actionbar(Requires Restart).
Hide video button in actionbar(Requires Restart)[Not available for now].
Disable contact status in chat screen(Requires Restart).
Enter here to mod Home Screen.
Enter here to mod Chat Screen.
Enter here to enable/disable Hidden Mods
Options to Backup/Restore data of WhatsApp.

Show All details of the log

Mods related to media and status.
Enabled by default, disable to turn it off.
Increase video file size upload limit to 700MB
Images will be sent in Highest quality/resolution
An unexpected error occurred forcing WhatsApp to stop. Please help me fix this by sending error data, all you have to do is click OK (only in ENGLISH or south Indian languages please)
You might add your comments about the problem below:
Move contact name and last seen to center of actionbar(Requires Restart).
Default Password is: 0000, Change it to yours!
Settings file not found in here %s
Preferences file not created yet. Apply any MOD first, please
